Class ErrorController

java.lang.Object
org.supsi.controller.errors.ErrorController
All Implemented Interfaces:
IErrorController
public class ErrorController extends Object implements IErrorController
Controller responsible for handling error messages and displaying them to the user through a popup view. Uses the IErrorModel to manage error data and the IView interface to render the popup.
